airframe.name: TEST_I2C
airframe.makefile:
ARCH=lpc21 mb.ARCHDIR = $(ARCH)
LPC21ISP_BAUD = 38400 LPC21ISP_XTAL = 12000
#FLASH_MODE = IAP FLASH_MODE = ISP
mb.CFLAGS += -DBOARD_CONFIG=\"conf_motor_bench.h\" -DPERIODIC_FREQUENCY='1000.' -DUSE_SYS_TIME mb.srcs = $(SRC_ARCH)/main_test_i2c.c mcu_periph/sys_time.c $(SRC_ARCH)/mcu_periph/sys_time_arch.c $(SRC_ARCH)/armVIC.c
mb.CFLAGS += -DUSE_LED
mb.CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART0 -DUART0_BAUD=B38400 mb.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/mcu_periph/uart_arch.c
mb.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=PprzTransport -DDOWNLINK_DEVICE=Uart0 mb.srcs += subsystems/datalink/downlink.c subsystems/datalink/pprz_transport.c
mb.CFLAGS += -DDATALINK=PPRZ -DPPRZ_UART=Uart0
